name: Chatzi
author: Daynaweb Group

sections.description:
This super lightweight plugin adds a floating button on your website that your users can click on it and redirect easily to whatsapp web or whatsapp application on their mobile phones.

Why using Chatzi? ✅

  • Super lightweight plugin (Even THE MOST lightweight chatting on whatsapp plugin)
  • Does not slow down your website loading speed
  • Best UI and UX
  • Easy to use
  • Without complicated settings
  • User-friendly

Chatzi features: 😍

  • All texts are customizable
  • Supports RTL websites
  • You can add a default text that will be available for your users to send you that default text just by hitting the send button
  • Supports Whatsapp Web and Whatsapp application on Android and iOS devices
  • You can change the position of the button to top or bottom of right or left side of your website

Made with ❤ by wordpress experts from Daynaweb Group.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ folder, or install the plugin through the WordPress Add plugin page directly.
  2. Go to the Plugins page and activate the plugin.
  3. Access plugin settings under Settings menu from wordpress dashboard.
sections.faq:
Does this plugin slow down my website loading speed?

No! Our first priority of developing chatzi plugin is to not affect the loading speed after activating plugin and keep chatzi a super lightweight plugin.

Can I change the position of whatsapp button?

Yes! You can simply change it through the plugin Settings.

Where is plugin settings?

After activating the plugin, go through Settings menu from your wordpress dashboard and you can see Chatzi Settings

By kamransafari on September 27, 2022

I was exactly looking for a light plugin for contacting in whatsapp for my wordpress site. Recommend it.
